name: UKNON Jones - The Taïwang's stone (0.15)
description:
The main character (UKNON Jones), and his best friend (Max), is going to search a treasure. They will find a destroyed city and learn that it's an enemy ( Black Guynelk), a boss of the Team Black, who destroyed it to blackmail a princess of a kingdom (Princess Saphir), to know where is situated an invaluable treasure, the Taïwang's stone. After understood that, UKNON Jones, passionate of treasure, is going to want to save the princess to know or is this famous treasure..

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/UknonJones/
